title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 115 - School District And Boces Plans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 115 - School District And Boces Plans

State Regulations
§ 115.1 - BOCES regional technology plans
§ 115.2 - Repealed
§ 115.3 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 115

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207, 1608-a, 1716-a, 1950 [4][c]; L. 1985, ch. 53, § 17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
